title: Hospital team in action
creator_credit: Michael Luke, Anne Balfour Fraser and Samaritan Films
brief_description: Through the story of a boy who develops osteomyelitis, and the work of the hospital team which attends him, illustrates the varied skills which together contribute to the healing work of any large hospital.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Luke, Anne Balfour Fraser and Samaritan Films
